column5: Our 1/1 Condo is located on the 4th floor at Gulfview 2 next to Schlitterbahn Resort and Schlitterbahn Water Park. Easy 2 minute walk to the beach, no streets to cross. Beautiful relaxing decor with 2 queen beds in the bedroom and a queen sofa bed in the living room. Full dining table and breakfast bar. Fully stocked kitchen. Cable TV, free WiFi, and free parking. Schlitterbahn discount tickets available in the clubhouse.  Tax rate is 17% Airbnb collects 6% 11% incl in nightly rate
column8: Beautiful Beach Getaway 1/1 Next to Schlitterbahn
